definition.para: A translation of the song's thematic classification, printed in Spanish on pages 219-221 of "Romances judeo-españoles de Oriente: nueva recolección."

instructions.para: Search for the song title on pages 219-221 of ""Romances judeo-españoles de Oriente : nueva recolección"."
Separate multiple thematic elements with a semicolon and space ("; ").
Begin each new thematic element with a capital letter.
If no match is found, do not provide a value.

customization.para: Search for the song title on pages 219-221 of "Romances judeo-españoles de Oriente : nueva recolección."
Separate multiple thematic elements with a semicolon and space ("; ").
Begin each new thematic element with a capital letter.
If no match is found, do not provide a value.

example.para: Capture and seduction by taking aboard ship
Girl enticed into boat and abducted; Capture by luring; Capture and seduction by taking aboard ship; Apple tree as symbol of seduction

customization.para: Capture and seduction by taking aboard ship
Girl enticed into boat and abducted; Capture by luring; Capture and seduction by taking aboard ship; Apple tree as symbol of seduction

history.justification: SSDC will make use of existing metadata for recordings of ballad performances; existing metadata includes information about Romancero themes for each song
